title: How to write an application of TC in English to a school principal - Quora

response.answer_text: Looking for How To Write an Application for TC? Transfer Certificate can be written by students or parents to the school principals by requesting to provide application for TC. This Transfer Certificate is useful to students to join in new school by leaving the old school. Without Transfer Certificate students will not get admission in another school, students will get admissions in new school only by submitting transfer certificate which states that a student has completed his admission in old school. Sample - Application for TC (Transfer Certificate) ToThe Principal,St.Joseph High School,Visakhapatnam,Andhra Pradesh. Date: March 13th 2020 Subject: Requesting Transfer Certificate With humble request, I am Requesting the principal to provide my transfer certificate as i have completed 10th class in your institute. So I am requesting the principal to provide my school leaving certificate as soon as possible so that it will be helpful to my future admission process. Thanking You, Yours Sincerely,Lavanya,Roll No: 26.

Use this as an opportunity to practice your writing! Structure it the way that would make sense to the reader and provide complete information. In this case: Who is the letter addressed to? The principal. So, provide his/her title, and the name and address of the school along with the date Address the teacher as Dear Sir or Dear Ma'am Start by writing who you are along with essential information such as your admission number, or ID number, and possibly, your date of joining. Place your request - that you need a TC along with an optional, brief reasonState by when you need the certificate and how they should send it to you. Provide your address or mention that it is written belowThank the principalSign off with your name, phone number, and address Finally, don't send the letter, or really any writing without checking it first. Make sure there are no spelling and grammar errors …even if it is just an administrative email, it is important no to let mistakes go by. You can try using a free online checker such as WritingAssistant by www.englishhelper.com
